author: Jacob Bunge
title: Lawmakers, Farm Groups Outline Fix for Tax Conundrum
text:
Lawmakers and agricultural companies say they have found a fix for a provision in the new U.S. tax law that stirred controversy in the Farm Belt.
The amendment to the tax law, which legislators aim to include in an omnibus spending bill later this month, would change a provision that provided farmers with larger tax savings if they sold crops to agricultural cooperatives. Private and investor-owned grain companies feared the measure put them at a disadvantage, potentially forcing them to pay more to secure crop suppliesâ€”or...
